content: **crocheted spider s web in drops paris theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the miss spider pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-734 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- ***spider s web *** measurements across from tip to tip approx 40 cm = 16 slightly stretched materials drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g color 16 white or use 50 g color 15 black 1 web weighs approx 25 g crochet gauge 17 double crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm = us 6 hook size is only a guide if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/0-1427-miss-spider
